entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:22 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow squalls. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow squalls. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 02:25 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 02:25 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 02:25 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High minus 17. Forecast issued 02:25 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 02:25 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
